Text: Since alot of people have downloaded and never left comments, I have stopped seeding and will not provide any more of my 5.1 surround remasters.

Here's an unbiased/objective comments.  I downloaded this file, extracted it and compared it to a 225kbps version of the same portions of the same song. This "remaster" pales in comparison to the 225kbps version.  It's flat and dull compared to the digital version of the 25th Anniversary Edition of Thriller.  I'm very sorry.
